amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in House Report 115-830 to prevent funds from being used to change existing placer mining plan of operations with regard to reclamation activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
